title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the form of political participation that saw the largest change between the 2018 and 2020 elections, as shown in the bar graph.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the difference in overall participation between the midterm and presidential elections, as shown in the bar graph.

For Task C, the response must use the data to correctly draw a conclusion about how linkage institutions might have contributed to the difference in political participation between the midterm and presidential elections, as shown in the bar graph.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how the different levels of political participation, as shown in the bar graph, might demonstrate the concept of political efficacy.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the prompt.
